overall_perception_summary.headline: The Clinical Commodity
overall_perception_summary.description: Cliganic executes a ruthless 'Value Hacker' strategy, stripping away cosmetic romance to sell pure utility. By packaging a premium natural ingredient (Argan) in a bulk industrial format (16oz) under a clinically-coded brand name, it democratizes access to organic beauty. It plays the role of the wholesale supplier to the 'Smart DIY' consumer, proving safety through a wall of third-party certifications rather than brand storytelling.

foundation.title: Certified Supply House
foundation.description: The brand anchors its authority in 'The Green Lab'—validating natural harvest with clinical rigor (USDA, Non-GMO). It positions itself as The Democratizer, offering 'Bulk Wholesale' access to ingredients typically gatekept by luxury pricing. The value system is Safety First, prioritizing 'Hypoallergenic' tolerance and 'Single Ingredient' purity over complex formulations.

identity.title: The Reliable Supplier
identity.description: The personality is The Reliable Expert—distant, factual, and devoid of emotional fluff. Driven by The Innocent archetype (60%), it obsesses over purity ('100% Pure,' 'No synthetic additives'). The tone is Clinical Authority, speaking in specifications and certification lists rather than sentences.

communication.title: The Spec Sheet
communication.description: Messaging is purely functional, acting as The Chemist who sells the noun ('Organic Argan Oil') rather than the dream. The USP is The Value Hacker, using bulk economics to undercut the category. KSPs rely on Formula Purity, using a checklist of 'Free-From' and 'Certified' logos as the ultimate proof of worth.

benefits.title: Pragmatic Maintenance
benefits.description: Functionally, it offers simple Hydration and Maintenance for 'dry skin' and 'brittle hair.' The emotional payoff is Relief/Safety—the peace of mind that comes from a 'Hypoallergenic' product. Socially, it is The Pragmatist's badge, signaling a rejection of marketing markup in favor of raw utility.

marker_1.reasoning: The authority comes from the raw source ('100% Pure... Sustainable Natural Shea' implied context of single ingredient oils) and certifications ('USDA organic certified'). The mission is maintenance and restoration for 'Dry skin, brittle hair' and 'DIY Beauty needs,' creating a tool for the user to restore balance rather than a clinical cure.
marker_1.evidence: Certified Organic Argan Oil... 100% Pure, Single Ingredient... Sustainably Sourced... Ideal For Dry skin, brittle hair

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (5/5 Raw Nature) + Slider B (2/5 Restoration) maps to Territory 3. High nature origin plus restoration/maintenance goal aligns with Harmonizer logic.

marker_1.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] ORIGIN OF AUTHORITY (The Source of Power)

marker_2.reasoning: The 'Blast Radius' is focused on optimizing skin health via 'DIY Beauty needs' rather than saving the world, despite sustainability claims. The 'Access Barrier' is completely removed: 'Bulk Size, Great Value... Wholesale.' They are democratizing a premium ingredient by selling it in a jug.
marker_2.evidence: Bulk Size, Great Value... 16 oz Bulk Wholesale... for all your DIY Beauty needs... $9.98 [base price context]

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Optimization) + Slider B (5/5 Democratic) maps to Territory 1. Optimization scope plus democratic access is the definition of The Democratizers.

marker_3.reasoning: The explicit trade-off here is purity and tolerance. Claims like 'Hypoallergenic,' 'Alcohol Free,' and 'Single Ingredient' prioritize safety over complex potency. Information density is high on the spec-sheet side ('USDA Organic,' 'Non-GMO Verified'), acting as a certificate of analysis.
marker_3.evidence: Hypoallergenic... Alcohol Free... Not Tested On Animals... No synthetic additives, ever... Non-GMO Certified

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Hypoallergenic) + Slider B (1/5 The Spec Sheet) maps to Territory 1. Low performance (safety) plus high data (specs) aligns with Safety First.

marker_3.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Spec Sheet (Exact percentages, full disclosure)

marker_4.reasoning: The name 'Cliganic' (Clinical + Organic) anchors the aesthetic in a professional, almost medical utility space ('Professional' aesthetic). The value proposition is explicit 'Bulk Utility' ('16 oz Bulk Wholesale'). It feels like buying supplies from a dispensary, not a boutique.
marker_4.evidence: Brand: Cliganic... Bulk Size, Great Value... 16 oz Bulk Wholesale... Item model number: CL-BE-030-16

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Professional) + Slider B (1/5 Bulk Utility) maps to Territory 1. Sterile/Professional aesthetic plus utility value aligns with The Medical Authority (or Supply House).

marker_5.reasoning: The tone is distant and highly functional (Warmth: 2/5). It relies on 'The Cliganic Commitment' and certifications to establish authority (Authority: 4/5). It doesn't want to be your friend; it wants to be your verified supplier.
marker_5.evidence: The Cliganic Commitment... Certified Organic... Non-GMO Verified... proudly USDA organic certified

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Distant) + Slider B (4/5 Specialist) maps to Territory 3. Low warmth plus high authority aligns with The Reliable Expert.

marker_6.reasoning: The brand is obsessed with purity and stripping away the unnecessary. The Innocent (60%) leads with '100% Pure' and 'No synthetic additives.' The Sage (25%) supports with 'USDA Organic' and 'Non-GMO' truths. The Caregiver (15%) appears in the 'Hypoallergenic' safety promise. This purity-focused mix creates The Philosopher territory.
marker_6.evidence: 100% Pure, Single Ingredient... No synthetic additives, ever... USDA organic certified... Hypoallergenic

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Marker 6 uses percentage distribution, not sliders. Territory derived from archetype group dominance (Independence/Stability).

marker_7.reasoning: The voice is purely informational, reading like a spec sheet. There is zero humor (1/5) or enthusiasm (2/5). It relies on lists ('Benefits,' 'Uses') and certification titles. This dryness signals competence and sterility.
marker_7.evidence: Product description 1... Benefits 2... Uses 1... The Cliganic Commitment... Certified Organic

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Humor (1) + Enthusiasm (2) + Formality (3) aligns with the hard rule for Territory 1 - Clinical Authority.

marker_8.reasoning: While direct visual analysis is limited, the brand name 'Cliganic' and the heavy reliance on certification logos ('USDA Organic', 'Non-GMO', 'EWG Verified') implies a clean, white, sterile aesthetic designed to signal safety and compliance (Pharma-Code). The data suggests a 'Swiss Grid' layout of information tables.
marker_8.evidence: Brand: Cliganic... USDA Organic... EWG Verified... Non-GMO Project Verified... Table of products with checkmarks

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Inferred scores: Slider A (2/5 Cool) + Slider B (1/5 Swiss Grid) maps to Territory 1. Clinical name + certification density implies Pharma-Code aesthetic.

marker_9.reasoning: The hook is the molecule itself: '100% Pure, Single Ingredient Oil.' It doesn't sell 'Glow' or 'Youth'; it sells the noun 'Argan Oil.' The persuasion is entirely rational, relying on a stack of verified logos (USDA, Non-GMO, Vegan) to prove value.
marker_9.evidence: 100% Pure, Single Ingredient Oil... Organic Argan Oil... USDA organic certified... Non-GMO Certified

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Molecule) + Slider B (2/5 Rational) maps to Territory 1. Ingredient focus plus data-driven persuasion aligns with The Chemist.

marker_10.reasoning: The protagonist is not a person but a set of standards ('USDA', 'EWG', 'The Cliganic Commitment'). The setting is the source ('Sustainably Sourced', 'Organic'). This combination creates a story where the lab's role is to verify and deliver nature's purity without interference.
marker_10.evidence: Proudly USDA organic certified... The Cliganic Commitment... Sustainably Sourced & Minimally Processed... EWG Verified

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Nobel) + Slider B (4/5 Harvest) maps to Territory 3. Institutional authority plus harvest setting aligns with The Green Lab.

marker_11.reasoning: The primary validator is 'The Certifiers' (USDA, EWG, Leaping Bunny). The proof type is 'The List'—a checklist of what is *not* in the bottle ('Alcohol Free,' 'No synthetic additives,' 'Cruelty-Free'). The selling point is the absence of contaminants.
marker_11.evidence: USDA organic certified... EWG Verified... Alcohol Free... Not Tested On Animals... Free from additives

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 The Certifiers) + Slider B (4/5 The List) maps to Territory 2. Third-party validation plus checklist proof aligns with Formula Purity.

marker_12.reasoning: Cliganic is a textbook Value Hacker. It sells a commodity ('Single Ingredient') but differentiates via 'Bulk Size, Great Value' and 'Wholesale' formatting. It hacks the category by offering the same certified quality as luxury brands but in a 16oz jug for a fraction of the per-ounce price.
marker_12.evidence: Bulk Size, Great Value... 16 oz Bulk Wholesale... 100% Pure, Single Ingredient... $9.98 [context of pricing]

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Commodity) + Slider B (1/5 The Price Leader) maps to Territory 3. Commodity ownership plus price leadership aligns with The Value Hacker.

marker_12.slider_a_label: [SLIDER] THE OWNERSHIP CLAIM (What Makes You Unique)
marker_12.slider_b_position_name: ▼ The Price Leader (USP is radical affordability)

marker_13.reasoning: The focus is on specs and certification education. The A+ content is a comparison table of attributes ('Certified Organic,' 'Non-GMO Verified' checkmarks). It functions as a textbook or catalog to prove the 'thesis' of purity.
marker_13.evidence: Product description 1... Benefits 2... Uses 1... Comparison Table with Checkmarks (Organic, Non-GMO, Cruelty Free)

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Textbook) + Slider B (1/5 The Thesis) maps to Territory 1. Educational depth plus trust-building intent aligns with Science Education.

marker_14.reasoning: The product is a functional lipid for 'Dry skin, brittle hair & nails.' It is a maintenance tool for 'DIY Beauty needs' rather than a high-tech fixer. The outcome is 'Safer chemicals' and simple physical restoration of moisture.
marker_14.evidence: Ideal For Dry skin, brittle hair & nails... DIY Beauty needs... 100% Pure... Multi-Purpose

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (3/5 Maintenance) + Slider B (2/5 Sensory) maps to Territory 3. Maintenance action plus sensory/health outcome aligns with Hydration.

marker_15.reasoning: The primary emotion is the absence of worry. Claims like 'Hypoallergenic,' 'Safer chemicals,' and 'Discontinue use if redness occurs' cater to a user seeking a 'Sanctuary' from irritants. It's reassurance in a bottle.
marker_15.evidence: Hypoallergenic... Safer chemicals... Discontinue use if redness or irritation occurs... For external use only

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (2/5 Reassurance) + Slider B (1/5 Sanctuary) maps to Territory 1. Reassurance plus internal focus aligns with Relief / Safety.

marker_15.slider_b_position_name: ▼ Sanctuary (I feel safe inside my own body)

marker_16.reasoning: Buying a 16oz bulk jug of oil is the ultimate pragmatist move. It signals 'The Tool' motivation—treating skincare as a utility. It rejects 'The Statement' of luxury packaging in favor of 'Wholesale' efficiency.
marker_16.evidence: Bulk Size, Great Value... 16 oz Bulk Wholesale... DIY Beauty needs... Item: Volume 16 Fluid Ounces

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 The Tool) + Slider B (1/5 The Standard) maps to Territory 1. Tool motivation plus standard/mass orientation aligns with The Pragmatist.

marker_16.slider_a_position_name: ▼ The Tool (I buy it only because it functions)

marker_17.reasoning: With 34,000+ ratings and a #13 rank, this is the herd's choice. Buying it signifies 'Normalization'—you are making the smart, verified choice that thousands of others have made. It is the Amazon Basic of Argan Oil.
marker_17.evidence: 34,905 global ratings... Best Sellers Rank: #13 in Hair Treatment Oils... 4.6 out of 5 stars

evaluation_check.coherence_reasoning: Slider A (1/5 Normalization) + Slider B (1/5 The Majority) maps to Territory 1. Normalization goal plus majority scale aligns with The Safe Choice.

marker_17.slider_a_position_name: ▼ Normalization ('I want to look like everyone else')
